title: What time are they turning on TFT Ranked?
body:
Hey i was just wondering what time is TFT ranked getting turned on? Seeing as it's patch 9.23, when will we be able to play TFT Ranked?

Edited: Ranked is now up!

replies.body: it's on oi, I just realized it when I ranked up practicing in ranked lol (better fights), feels like they've got enough guides up online now, saw like 3-5 teams countering me well

It is a 100% dog shit game mode. I will never ever put 1 dollar into that game mode. Not for anything. 
Rank is on right now.. Still the crap mode it was when it came out. 

DOG SHIT MODE FROM A DOG SHIT COMPANY. FREE HONG!

> [{quoted}](name=isty,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fu670eON,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-20T02:39:26.000+0000)
>
> It is a 100% dog shit game mode. I will never ever put 1 dollar into that game mode. Not for anything. 
> Rank is on right now.. Still the crap mode it was when it came out.

> DOG SHIT MODE FROM A DOG SHIT COMPANY. FREE HONG!

the only bit I agree with is when you use to be able to leave stuff out and nobody would steal it but now if you say something they really don't like you get arrested over there. Only the bugs, glitches, and cheaters make it bad. P.S ranked's on again
